name: Gemma 3 4B (Instruct)
description: Balanced open-source Gemma model with multimodal support. Strong performance rivaling much larger models. 128K context with vision capabilities.
notes: Open-source model with competitive performance vs Gemma 2-27B. Benchmarks: MMLU 58.1, HumanEval 71.3, GSM8K 89.2. Trained on 4T tokens. Uses SigLIP vision encoder. Available via Google AI Studio or self-hosted. 140+ language support. Requires ~3.4GB memory (4-bit).
